official_title: To amend the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 to exempt certain research and educational licensees from annual charges.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 to exempt the holder of any license for a federally-owned research reactor used primarily for educational training and academic research purposes from the assessment of annual charges made by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.

titles.title: To amend the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 to exempt certain research and educational licensees from annual charges.
